Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Waives the residency requirement for the office of Putnam county attorney
Summary: Waives the residency requirement for the office of Putnam county attorney.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to waiving the residency requirement for the office of Putnam county attorney
